dmca.title: SAS complains of homepage logo use
dmca.body:
From: [private]
To: [Private]
Subject: Karsten's Home Page
Date: Tue, 21 Nov 2000 16:02:36 -0500
[private]

Dear Karsten:
I was just looking at your home page at http://pw1.netcom.com/~kmself/index.html and while we appreciate your support of SAS, I must request that you immediately remove from your site the unauthorized copy of our logo which you have displayed on this page.  

Please respond within 5 business days confirming that you have complied with this request.  If you do not comply within the allotted time, we will take further action as we deem appropriate.

Sincerely yours,
[private]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[private], CLAS, Senior Paralegal 
Intellectual Property Specialist
